trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement class represents a configuration element for an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La classe ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement rappresenta un elemento di configurazione per un <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> can be configured for server applications using standard configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>possono essere configurati per applicazioni server usando i file di configurazione standard.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo costruttore viene utilizzato per inizializzare una nuova istanza del <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>(classe), il <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A>è impostata su <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>, <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>e il <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection>è impostata su `null`.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance should be set to appropriate values for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà di <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>istanza della classe deve essere impostata su valori appropriati per l'applicazione prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: The BuildPolicy method builds a new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance based on the properties set on the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo metodo BuildPolicy <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> istanza in base alle proprietà impostate sul <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance must be set before calling the BuildPolicy method.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà di <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>istanza della classe deve essere impostata prima di chiamare il metodo BuildPolicy.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance that represents the extended protection policy created.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> istanza che rappresenta i criteri di protezione estesa creato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il personalizzato Provider nome servizio (SPN) elenco utilizzato per confrontare nome SPN di un client per questo elemento di configurazione dei criteri.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref> that includes the custom SPN list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"> </xref> che include l'elenco SPN personalizzato utilizzato per la corrispondenza nome SPN di un client.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy enforcement value for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore di imposizione dei criteri per questo elemento di configurazione dei criteri.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> valore che indica quando applicare i criteri di protezione estesa.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo di protezione applicato dai criteri di protezione estesa per questo elemento di configurazione dei criteri.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> valore che indica il tipo di protezione applicato dai criteri.
